doc:
Stanley Fafara https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stanley_Fafara 0 Stanley Albert Fafara (September 20, 1949 – September 20, 2003) was an American child actor, best known for his role as Hubert "Whitey" Whitney in the original Leave It to Beaver television series. His older brother, Tiger, played "Tooey W. Brown" in the series. Stanley_Albert_Fafara ( September_20_,_1949 – September_20_,_2003 ) was an_American_child_actor , best_known for his_role as Hubert_"_Whitey_"_Whitney in the_original Leave It to Beaver_television_series . His_older_brother , Tiger , played " Tooey_W._Brown " in the_series .
